question: In which body was the resolution ‘Convention on the Prohibition of the use of Nuclear Weapons’ adopted recently?
explanation:
In the first committee of the United Nations General Assembly (UNGA), two resolutions sponsored by India were adopted. These resolutions are Convention on the Prohibition of the use of Nuclear Weapons’ and ‘Reducing Nuclear Danger’ under the ‘Nuclear weapons’ cluster.
These resolutions are seen as India’s commitment towards the goal of nuclear disarmament.
